categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: A battle at the planet Toong'L occurred durign the Yuuzhan Vong War, in 29 ABY. After the Battle of Caluula, the Yuuzhan Vong attacked Toong'L. The Vong then established a yammosk outpost on the planet, in preparation for the Defense of Mon Calamari.
This battle makes its unique appearance in The Essential Atlas. The battle is only illustrated on the galactic map of the conflict.
